content:
Hey, we are currently running our FHIR Server with version 4.7.1
Now we are running in some problems with certain FHIR search requests which are blocked by the MaxIncludePageCount of 1000.
I saw that there is the option to increase this using the config file, but that parameter was implemented in version 4.8.1
Is there a possibility to increase this parameter in an older version as well?
hi Dorian, we don't typically patch older versions like that. is there something preventing you from upgrading?

Hey, I'm not asking for a patch, only if there is a different way to set this variable.
If that's not the case, we will update in the future
ya, i think it was hardcoded prior to that setting. it used the fixed MAX_PAGE_SIZE constant for both the max "match" resource count and the max "include" resource count (so up to 2000 total)
Dorian Quell has marked this topic as resolved.
